subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Reggie Bush's 88-yard touchdown, where he taunted Brian Urlacher and tumbled into the end zone, epitomized a Saints team that got far on exuberance and effort before showing its inexperience.
snippet: Reggie Bush's 88-yard touchdown, where he taunted Brian Urlacher and tumbled into the end zone, epitomized a Saints team that got far on exuberance and effort before showing its inexperience.
